## Matrix.PerspectiveFovLH() method

Creates a left-handed perspective projection matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static PerspectiveFovLH(fov: number, aspect: number, znear: number, zfar: number): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fov | <code>number</code> | defines the horizontal field of view |
|  aspect | <code>number</code> | defines the aspect ratio |
|  znear | <code>number</code> | defines the near clip plane |
|  zfar | <code>number</code> | defines the far clip plane |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

a new matrix as a left-handed perspective projection matrix
